title: Richard Leakey, Kenyan Fossil Hunter and Conservationist, Dies at 77
content:
1. Richard Leakey, Kenyan Fossil Hunter and Conservationist, Dies at 77  The New York Times
  2. Kenyan conservationist Richard Leakey dies aged 77  Al Jazeera English
  3. World-renowned Kenyan conservationist Richard Leakey dies at 77  CNN
  4. Fossil hunter Richard Leakey who showed humans evolved in Africa dies at 77  The Guardian
  5. Kenyan paleoanthropologist Richard Leakey dies at 77  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
